channel.title: 508 doors help

item.title: 508 doors help
item.dc:creator: @anelm anelm
item.description:
@anelm wrote:

im currently using this code to get through doors, i have tried to use a code of the 317 to open doors but i have to declare alot of parts in order for the code to work, Im not sure what kind of code i need. I would appreciate any help

case 26427: if(p.absX == 2907 && p.absY == 5265) { p.setCoords(2908, 5265,0); } if(p.absX == 2908 && p.absY == 5265) { p.setCoords(2907, 5265, 0); } p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9837, 241, 2); p.requestAnim(2246, 0); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You open the door."); break;

Read full topic
